entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for target. Stand by to proceed with the attack.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Nav location to the target has been located. Proceed with extreme prejudice.
entries.assassinate_success: Good work, pilot. Let's see them hunting illegally without weapons.
entries.autorewardbody: This should help make those darn Chiss poachers a bit less aggressive and definitely less well armed. Thank you for a good job on this one. Payment enclosed.
entries.destroy_escort: The entire squad must be eradicated.
entries.failed_escape: They made their delivery...now those Chiss poachers have a new supply of weapons! Return to Kerssoc for further instructions. Hopefully, we'll try again.
entries.quest_escort_d: Destroy any other Chiss ships that try to interfere with your goal. Make sure none escapes.
entries.quest_location_d: Destroy a shipment of weapons inbound for Chiss poachers on Kashyyyk.
entries.quest_target_d: The Chiss poacher ace fighter is carrying the weapons. Destroy him!
entries.title: Kashyyyk System: Destroy an inbound shipment of Chiss poacher weapons
entries.title_d: Kerssoc received intel about an inbound shipment of weapons for the Chiss poachers that have been such a thorn in the Rodian hunters' side. Destroy that shipment of weapons.
